entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `Vector.Contains(scalar)`, `.IndexOf(scalar)` and `LastIndexOf(scalar)` #83010
  • Quic tests are failing on macOS #83009
  • .Net 4.8 fails with 7.0.1 ProtectedData's binding redirect. #83008
  • Default interface implementation of static abstract operator is not resolved. #83007
  • [mono] Incorrect target method resolution in ldvirtftn+delegate creation #83003
  • Add CollectionsMarshal support for the Stack<T> collection #82999
  • Bug in Configuration Binder 7.0.3 #82998
  • SourceGen build errors if JsonSerializableAttribute argument name 'type' is included #82997
  • SourceGen build errors for [JsonIgnore]'d RegularExpressions.GroupCollection #82996
  • [API Proposal]: Add TryRent to ArrayPool<T> #82995
  • Array enumerators are not preinitialized anymore #82993
    8.0.0
  • Concurrent exceptions might cause createdump to fail #82989
    8.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Incorrectly eliminated zero-extending mov after `cdqe` #82685
    8.0.0
  • Consuming static readonly Vector128<T> fields results in non-optimal codegen #13514
    Future
  • [Proposal] Attributes on Statements and Expressions #82991
  • WASM GC Proposal and .NET #82992
  • [7.0] System.Net.Http.Json nuget issue in allconfigurations #81914
  • Content-Length not appended when using JsonContent #82984

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Fix jiterpreter null check optimization bug #83006
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Stress testing gtSplitTree #83005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix virtual method resolution in mono_delegate_trampoline (). #83004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable more intrinsics for Tier0 #83002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use Vector128 and Vector256 in interface cast #83000
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Experiment: Cache location of unwind sections #82994
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve perf of CharEnumerator #82990
    area-System.Runtime
  • Allow PeriodicTimer to have an infinite timeout #82986
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [JIT] Fixed improper peephole zero-extension removal when cdq/cwde instructions are involved #82733
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix BitConverter.ToXx error message #82987
    area-System.Runtime
  • Replace remaining instances of COMPlus with DOTNET #82985
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Replace some unnecessary use of CompareInfo #82988
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449

Updated

  • Add IPAddress ISpanFormattable/Parsable implementations #82913
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch JsonReaderHelper.IndexOfQuoteOrAnyControlOrBackSlash to use IndexOfAnyValues #82789
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • JIT: initial implementation of profile synthesis #82926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update alpine test images #82931
    area-Infrastructure
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82934
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • JIT: Assume allocations succeed #82961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Add basic SIMD support to the jiterpreter #82773
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Allow wildcards when looking for nodes #82386
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
